title: How The SPY Happy Lens™ Works (FRENCH EDITION)
description:
Happy is here!

The SPY Happy Lens™ lets in the good rays that promote balance in the body, increase alertness, and have an uplifting effect on mood, while simultaneously blocking the bad rays. As an added bonus, it's also a polarized and color contrast-enhacing lens, giving you the best visual experience possible. 

The Happy Lens™ is now available and only from your friends at SPY. Learn more about the Happy Lens™ at http://www.spyoptic.com/happy and find your local retailer at http://www.spyoptic.com/dealers
